New Records: LeBron James broke Michael Jordan's record for the most 30-point games in NBA history with 563 such games.
LeBron James moved into fourth place in the most games played in the NBA with 1,523 games, trailing only Robert Parish, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, and Dirk Nowitzki.
Key Match Events: The Lakers took a 14-13 lead with seven minutes and 31 seconds left in the first quarter, which they never lost.
Anthony Davis returned from a one-game absence and scored 18 points with 19 rebounds.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers won their seventh game out of their last nine.
